arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorPlayer, sLevelAreaName)
	if sLevelAreaName == S_LEVEL_AREA then
		Hydra.EventSendToActor("PlayerInLevelArea", idSelf, idSelf)
	end
end

function Start()
	if #Hydra.PlayerActorsInLevelArea(S_LEVEL_AREA) > 0 then
		Hydra.EventSendToActor("PlayerInLevelArea", idSelf, idSelf)
	end
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
-- wakeup boss
idBoss = Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_BOSS)[1]
if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idBoss) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idBoss) then 
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(idBoss, EG_BOSS_INVULN_VFX)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idBoss, POWER_DEFAULT_IDLE)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBoss)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idBoss, false)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idSelf, SFX_BOSS_ARRIVAL)
	Hydra.MinimapAddPing(idBoss, 10)
end

-- prevent worship AI behaviors
Hydra.ActorDelete(ID_WORSHIP_TARGET)
for i, idMonster in pairs(Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_WORSHIPERS)) do 
	Hydra.ActorRemoveMergedAIState(idMonster, AISTATE_WORSHIP_LOOP)
end

-- spawn adds (we cant rely on systemic minions here because the boss is spawned during startup)
Hydra.ActorEnable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSelf, "ADDS")[1])

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)

	Hydra.ActorDisable(idActorSpawner)
	
	-- store reference to boss for attractor vfx in HeartBeat callbacks
	idBoss = idActorSpawned
	
	Hydra.QuestSetCustomParamFromActor(1, idBoss)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idActorSpawned, 5)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorSpawned, EG_BOSS_INVULN_VFX, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idActorSpawned, POWER_BOSS_INVULN_IDLE)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorSpawned, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idActorSpawned, true)
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	-- AISTATE_WORSHIP_LOOP is a marker level override. Set it to an AI state that will cause your monsters to 
	-- do a believable worship AI loop (EVT_Monster_Taunt_Loop_Self_Interrupt is a shippable fallback)
	Hydra.ActorFaceActor(idActorSpawned, idSelf)
	Hydra.ActorMergeAIState(idActorSpawned, AISTATE_WORSHIP_LOOP, idActorSpawned, 0)
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorSpawned, false)
	
	-- set up ritualist behavior... do anim, face center, play vfx
	Hydra.ActorDisable(idActorSpawner)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorSpawned, false)
	Hydra.QActorWait(idActorSpawned, Hydra.GetRandomFloat(0.0, 0.4))
	Hydra.QActorPower(idActorSpawned, POWER_RITUALIST_IDLE)
	
	-- provide ritualists dmg reduction so they are not killed before the kill phase
	Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_DMG_REDUCTION, "MAIN", idActorSpawned)
	
	-- insert refs into tables for Disrupt:Heart Beat vfx	
	tLivingRitualists[idActorSpawned] = true
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)
	
	-- spawn guards when player approaches ritual sites
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorDetector) and Hydra.ActorIsEnabled(idActorDetector) then
		for i, spawner in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "GUARDS")) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(spawner) then Hydra.ActorEnable(spawner) end
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorDamaged, true)
	Hydra.ActorInterruptPrimaryPower(idActorDamaged)
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
-- remove damage reduction from ritualists
for i, idMonster in pairs(Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_RITUALISTS)) do
	Hydra.BuffRemove(POWER_DMG_REDUCTION, "MAIN", idMonster)
end

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start()
	local sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD

	if Hydra.QuestGetBonusPhaseResult() then
		sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD_HEROIC
	end
	
	Events.SpawnRewardChest(CHEST_LOCATION, sChest)
end

unk_c47e01a:
function UF_PlayBurstFromRitual(idSelf) 

	local tLivingRitualists = Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_RITUALISTS)
	for i, idRitualist in pairs(tLivingRitualists) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idRitualist) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idRitualist) then
			Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectDuration(idRitualist, 3)
			Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor(idRitualist, idBoss, EG_RITUAL_ATTRACTOR_VFX, false, "HP_leftHand")
		end
	end
end
unk_993f312:
idBoss = ""
tRitualSiteByMonsterId = {}
tLivingRitualists = {}
T_SPAWNERS_CHAMPIONS = Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup(PSAG_CHAMP_SPAWNERS)

local tAllSites = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSelf, "RITUAL_SITES")
FYShuffle(tAllSites)

-- activate 3 sites per event run
for i, idSite in pairs(tAllSites) do
	if i < 4 then
		-- spawn ritualists
		for i, idSpawner in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSite, "RITUALISTS")) do 
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
			Hydra.ActorEnable(idSpawner)
		end
		-- do vfx
		Hydra.ActorEnable(idSite)
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idSite, 6)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idSite, EG_RITUALSITE_VFX, true)
	
	else 
		Hydra.ActorDisable(idSite)
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idSite)
	end
end

-- Spawn a champion for each world tier above 2
local nChampionCount = Hydra.GameGetCurrentWorldTier() - 1 -- subtract 1 instead of 2, function assumes 0-index
if nChampionCount > 0 and #T_SPAWNERS_CHAMPIONS >= nChampionCount then
	FYShuffle(T_SPAWNERS_CHAMPIONS)
	
	for i = 1, nChampionCount do
		Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(T_SPAWNERS_CHAMPIONS[i])
	end
end
